channel.title: Authors on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Portfolio

item.description:
Engineer with 2 years of experience in data analysis, processing, and visualization. I am currently pursuing a Diploma in Data Analytics.

Motivated and results-oriented professional with proven work in the data field. Capacity for teamwork, initiative, logical thinking, and assertive communication.

Working in IT has reaffirmed to me that lifelong learning is an individual’s greatest asset. And I look forward to expanding my knowledge and putting forth my acquired experience and skill set in my new Canadian career!

  • Programming languages : Python, SQL and Java.
  • Tools: SQL Server Management Studio, Jupyter Notebook, Power BI , Anaconda and SQL Microsoft Server (SQL Microsoft Integration Services and SQL Microsoft Analysis Services).
